verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

On the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> shall you <S%H6965>set<s%> up the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation.<s%>
And you shall <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H8033>therein<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony,<s%> and <S%H5526>cover<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> with the <S%H6532>veil.<s%>

And you shall <S%H935>bring<s%> in the <S%H7979>table,<s%> and set in <S%H6186>order<s%> the things that are to be set in <S%H6187>order<s%> on it; and you shall <S%H935>bring<s%> in the <S%H4501>candlestick,<s%> and <S%H5927>light<s%> the <S%H5216>lamps<s%> thereof.

And you shall <S%H5414>set<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> for the <S%H7004>incense<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H4539>hanging<s%> of the <S%H6607>door<s%> to the <S%H4908>tabernacle.<s%>

And you shall <S%H5414>set<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation.<s%>

And you shall <S%H5414>set<s%> the <S%H3595>laver<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> and the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and shall <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H8033>therein.<s%>
And you shall <S%H7760>set<s%> up the <S%H2691>court<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about, and <S%H5414>hang<s%> up the <S%H4539>hanging<s%> at the <S%H2691>court<s%> <S%H8179>gate.<s%>

And you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H4886>anoint<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that is therein, and shall <S%H6942>hallow<s%> it, and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> thereof: and it shall be <S%H6944>holy.<s%>

And you shall <S%H4886>anoint<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering, and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H3627>vessels,<s%> and <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> the <S%H4196>altar:<s%> and it shall be an <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy.<s%>
And you shall <S%H4886>anoint<s%> the <S%H3595>laver<s%> and his <S%H3653>foot,<s%> and <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> it.

And you shall <S%H7126>bring<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> to the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> and <S%H7364>wash<s%> them with <S%H4325>water.<s%>

And you shall <S%H3847>put<s%> on <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H899>garments,<s%> and <S%H4886>anoint<s%> him, and <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> him; that he may minister to me in the <S%H3547>priest's<s%> office.
And you shall <S%H7126>bring<s%> his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H3847>clothe<s%> them with <S%H3801>coats:<s%>

And you shall <S%H4886>anoint<s%> them, as you did <S%H4886>anoint<s%> their <S%H1>father,<s%> that they may minister to me in the <S%H3547>priest's<s%> office: for their <S%H4888>anointing<s%> shall surely be an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H3550>priesthood<s%> throughout their <S%H1755>generations.<s%>
Thus <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H4872>Moses:<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him, <S%H3651>so<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> he.

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass in the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> in the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> on the <S%H259>first<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> that the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> was <S%H6965>reared<s%> up.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6965>reared<s%> up the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> and <S%H5414>fastened<s%> his <S%H134>sockets,<s%> and <S%H7760>set<s%> up the <S%H7175>boards<s%> thereof, and <S%H5414>put<s%> in the <S%H1280>bars<s%> thereof, and <S%H6965>reared<s%> up his <S%H5982>pillars.<s%>

And he <S%H6566>spread<s%> <S%H6566>abroad<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H4372>covering<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> <S%H4605>above<s%> on it; as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

And he <S%H3947>took<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H5715>testimony<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H727>ark,<s%> and <S%H7760>set<s%> the <S%H905>staves<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H727>ark,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H3727>mercy<s%> seat <S%H4605>above<s%> on the <S%H727>ark:<s%>

And he <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> and <S%H7760>set<s%> up the <S%H6532>veil<s%> of the <S%H4539>covering,<s%> and <S%H5526>covered<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony;<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

And he <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H7979>table<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> on the <S%H3409>side<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> <S%H6828>northward,<s%> <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H6532>veil.<s%>
And he <S%H6186>set<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> in <S%H6186>order<s%> on it <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

And he <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H4501>candlestick<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> <S%H5227>over<s%> <S%H5227>against<s%> the <S%H7979>table,<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H3409>side<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> <S%H5045>southward.<s%>
And he <S%H5927>lighted<s%> the <S%H5216>lamps<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
And he <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H4196>altar<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H6532>veil:<s%>
And he <S%H6999>burnt<s%> <S%H5561>sweet<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> <S%H5921>thereon;<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
And he <S%H7760>set<s%> up the <S%H4539>hanging<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle.<s%>

And he <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering by the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> and <S%H5927>offered<s%> on it the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering <S%H4503><s%>and the meat offering; as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

And he <S%H7760>set<s%> the <S%H3595>laver<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> and the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> to <S%H7364>wash<s%> with.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H7364>washed<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> and their <S%H7272>feet<s%> thereat:

When they <S%H935>went<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> and when they <S%H7126>came<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> to the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> they <S%H7364>washed;<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

And he <S%H6965>reared<s%> up the <S%H2691>court<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> and the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and <S%H5414>set<s%> up the <S%H4539>hanging<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%> <S%H8179>gate.<s%> So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3615>finished<s%> the <S%H4399>work.<s%>

Then a <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H3680>covered<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> and the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> was not <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H935>enter<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H7931>stayed<s%> <S%H5921>thereon,<s%> and the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle.<s%>

And when the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> was <S%H5927>taken<s%> up from <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5265>went<s%> onward in <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H4550>journeys:<s%>
But <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> were not <S%H5927>taken<s%> up, then they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> not <S%H5704>till<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> that it was <S%H5927>taken<s%> up.

For the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was on the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> by <S%H3119>day,<s%> and <S%H784>fire<s%> was on it by <S%H3915>night,<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H4550>journeys.<s%>
